name: Dash Fall
description:
Dash Fall

A Game about a small little ball stuck inside a dark labyrinth.

Unlock Gates by collecting keys and Escape the labyrinth!

Tap and Drag to take Aim
Adjust Aim about the Aim Ring
While dashing, Tap once to activate GRAVITY
Once the ball has settled down, you may shoot the ball again!

Avoid the RED obstacles and dash your way up!

Good luck!

It's our first mobile-based game, but regardless we wanted to try new things out and give this platform a go as well.
We definitely learned a lot doing this project and we're planning to come out with new stuff too as soon as possible!
Of course, we will keep on updating this game too! Adding more features every month (hopefully :'))~! So please look forward to it! :)))
